title: Mark8 Controller Battery Replacement
description: The battery of the Mark8 Controller needs to be replaced as it no longer holds a charge for more than an hour.

title: Gimbal Case Lock Mechanism Repair
description: The dual-stage lock mechanism of the Gimbal Case is malfunctioning and needs repair to ensure the case secures properly.

title: Mark8 Drone Propeller Replacement
description: The propellers of the Mark8 drone are damaged and need to be replaced to ensure stable flight.

title: Mark8 Controller Screen Repair
description: The integrated screen of the Mark8 Controller is cracked and needs to be repaired to restore full functionality.

title: Gimbal Case Foam Replacement
description: The custom foam interior of the Gimbal Case needs to be replaced as it has worn out and no longer provides a secure fit for the drone.
